The MEME Suite

Motif-based sequence analysis tools

compute-uniform-priors

Usage:

compute-uniform-priors [prior value] <psp file>

Description

This program reads a MEME PSP file and computes a uniform prior equal to the mean of the input priors. Alternatively the user may specify the uniform prior value to be written.

The a PSP file containing the uniform priors is writen to stdout.

Input

<prior value>

(Optional) The prior value to be used instead of the mean value of the priors in the input file.

PSP Filename

<psp file>

The name of a PSP file in MEME PSP format.

Output

Output is in MEME PSP format with 10 entries of the uniform prior per line.

Options

There are no optional arguments.
